section1.title: Why Choose Safe Countries for Treatment?
section1.paragraph: Amidst growing military conflicts, patients are seeking calm regions for treatment. Germany, Turkey, and Spain provide security and advanced medical services, helping them focus on recovery. Chronic stress from instability can slow down recovery. According to the Journal of Psychosomatic Research (2023), stress weakens the immune system, slows wound healing, and exacerbates chronic conditions like cancer or heart disease.
